DellPhysicalDisk.description: An instance of DellPhysicalDisk will have Physical Disk specific data.
DellPhysicalDisk.longDescription: An instance of DellPhysicalDisk will have Physical Disk specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Connector.description: The property shall represent the controller port that the physical disk is connected to.
Connector.longDescription: The property shall represent the controller port that the physical disk is connected to.

DriveFormFactor.description: This property shall represent the physical disk form factor.
DriveFormFactor.longDescription: This property shall represent the physical disk form factor.

ForeignKeyIdentifier.description: This property indicates foreign key identifier of a secured drive. If the drive is not locked or secured by a foreign key, this property is an empty string.
ForeignKeyIdentifier.longDescription: This property indicates foreign key identifier of a secured drive. If the drive is not locked or secured by a foreign key, this property is an empty string.

FreeSizeInBytes.description: The property shall represent the free space available for a virtual disk.
FreeSizeInBytes.longDescription: The property shall represent the free space available for a virtual disk.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property represents the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property represents the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

ManufacturingDay.description: The property shall represent the physical disks manufacturing day.
ManufacturingDay.longDescription: The property shall represent the physical disks manufacturing day.

ManufacturingWeek.description: The property shall represent the physical disks manufacturing week.
ManufacturingWeek.longDescription: The property shall represent the physical disks manufacturing week.

ManufacturingYear.description: The property shall represent the physical disks manufacturing year.
ManufacturingYear.longDescription: The property shall represent the physical disks manufacturing year.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OperationName.description: This property represents the background operation that is running on a virtual disk. If no operation is running, the value is "None".
OperationName.longDescription: This property represents the background operation that is running on a virtual disk. If no operation is running, the value is "None".

OperationPercentCompletePercent.description: This property represents the percentage completion of the operation that is represented by the OperationName property.
OperationPercentCompletePercent.longDescription: This property represents the percentage completion of the operation that is represented by the OperationName property.

PPID.description: The property shall represent the Part Piece Identification (PPID) value for the physical disk.
PPID.longDescription: The property shall represent the Part Piece Identification (PPID) value for the physical disk.

PredictiveFailureState.description: The property shall represent the smart alert presence.
PredictiveFailureState.longDescription: The property shall represent the smart alert presence.

RAIDType.description: This property represents the type of RAID configuration.
RAIDType.longDescription: This property represents the type of RAID configuration.

RaidStatus.description: The property shall represent the RAID specific status.
RaidStatus.longDescription: The property shall represent the RAID specific status.

SASAddress.description: The property shall represent the SAS address of the drive.
SASAddress.longDescription: The property shall represent the SAS address of the drive.

Slot.description: This property represents the slot where drive is located. For PCIe SSDs and Add-in cards, refer Name property to get the slot information
Slot.longDescription: This property represents the slot where drive is located. For PCIe SSDs and Add-in cards, refer Name property to get the slot information

SystemEraseCapability.description: This property represents the storage component system-erase capability.
SystemEraseCapability.longDescription: This property represents the storage component system-erase capability.

T10PICapability.description: This property represents if this physical disk supports T10 Protection Information.
T10PICapability.longDescription: This property represents if this physical disk supports T10 Protection Information.

UsedSizeInBytes.description: The property shall represent the space already consumed by virtual disks.
UsedSizeInBytes.longDescription: The property shall represent the space already consumed by virtual disks.

title: #DellPhysicalDisk.v1_1_0.DellPhysicalDisk
